name: conically
content:

in the shape of a cone: conically shaped The disease is caused by a conically shaped organism. A hole was conically drilled between the two rock faces.
More examplesFewer examplesAnother dancer now appeared on the stage wearing a conically shaped traditional garment.Archaeologists discovered a number of skeletons that had been buried in a conically shaped pit.In the kitchen we came across a number of conically shaped wooden bowls.A conically hatted figure was chanting something in an unfamiliar language.
